data.text: @MelanieMoore Okay well if they make one that vibrates I want it tbh 😅
@MelanieMoore has he tried the finger trick
@MelanieMoore Yikes, that’s um, a lot of surgery and implanting
@MelanieMoore That will be a long operation.

OH and that's a medical illustration it's not gross or graphic but I put it behind a content filter just because some people may not wish to see such things.

But it's an ILLUSTRATION, like you'd see in a medical book. It's not a surgery pic, sorry I didn't clarify that

I'm just enjoying the schadenfreude because yes, yes he was a jerk. I don't actively wish him ill or anything, but I laughed. 

as far as penile implants thought the tech has come a LONG way and they seem pretty amazing. https://t.co/VqbT0xxbBb
@MelanieMoore In a vacuum, my guess would be that he’s looking for any sympathy he can get but I still can’t believe he would let that get back to you.

@MarkSmith_0610 I wondered that myself. He's never gotten over me, so Amy thinks it's a 'hey in case your heard things...my dick will be working again soon!' 

But, I really don't know. It was...weird. Odd. Strange. A very sucky conversation that was over another issue.
